briefTitle: Moxifloxacin AF Ophthalmic Solution for Treatment of Bacterial Conjunctivitis

armGroups.label: Moxifloxacin AF
interventionNames: Drug: Moxifloxacin Alternative Formulation (AF) Ophthalmic Solution 0.5%

outcomeMeasures.title: Clinical Cure at the Day 4 (EOT)/Exit Visit
outcomeMeasures.description: Clinical cure was attained if the sum of the 2 cardinal ocular signs of bacterial conjunctivitis (bulbar conjunctival injection and conjunctival discharge/exudate) was zero (ie, normal or absent) 12-48 hours after the last dose. Clinical cure was reported as a percentage. Only one eye (study eye) contributed to the analysis.

outcomeMeasures.title: Microbiological Success at the Day 4 (EOT)/Exit Visit
outcomeMeasures.description: Microbiological success was attained if the pre-therapy bacterial pathogens were eradicated 12-48 hours after the last dose. Microbiological success is reported as a percentage. Only one eye (study eye) contributed to the analysis.
